title: Airtel, Tech Mahindra team up for digital solutions across 5G, private networks, cloud - Economic Times
content: Airtel, Tech Mahindra team up for digital solutions across 5G, private networks, cloud  Economic Times
description: Airtel and Tech Mahindra will co-develop and market 5G use cases in India, according to a statement. The two firms will set up a joint 5G innovation lab for developing 'Make-in-India' use cases for the Indian and global markets.
